mapper.update:
update bm_rawnature
company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company_name = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rawnature_type = #{rawnatureType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rawnature_name = #{rawnatureName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
density = #{density,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
density_unit = #{densityUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
procure_price = #{procurePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
first_provider = #{firstProvider,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_unused = #{isUnused,jdbcType=CHAR},
handler_id = #{handlerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
handled_time = #{handledTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update bm_rawnature set company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_name = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rawnature_type = #{rawnatureType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rawnature_name = #{rawnatureName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, density = #{density,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, density_unit = #{densityUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, procure_price = #{procurePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, first_provider = #{firstProvider,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_unused = #{isUnused,jdbcType=CHAR}, handler_id = #{handlerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, handled_time = #{handledTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT density,procure_price,rawnature_name as raw_nature ,id as raw_nature_id from bm_rawnature WHERE company_id=#{companyId}
